p: The training was delivered online to 43 participants via Zoom. The didactic/theoretical material was presented in 30 min; 30 min was left for questions and answers. As noted above, a brief tips sheet and one book chapter (Feinstein & Collins, 2015) was also distributed via e‐mail to all volunteers. The Zoom presentation was recorded and also distributed for asynchronous viewing for volunteers who could not attend the initial training.
